documentation.text:
@title CappedCrowdsale
 @dev Crowdsale with a limit for total contributions.

@dev Constructor, takes maximum amount of wei accepted in the crowdsale.
 @param theCap Max amount of wei to be contributed

@dev Checks whether the cap has been reached.
 @return Whether the cap was reached

@title CappedCrowdsale
 @dev Crowdsale with a limit for total contributions.

@dev Constructor, takes maximum amount of wei accepted in the crowdsale.
 @param theCap Max amount of wei to be contributed

@dev Checks whether the cap has been reached.
 @return Whether the cap was reached

devdoc.details: Crowdsale with a limit for total contributions.

buyTokens(address).details: low level token purchase ***DO NOT OVERRIDE*** This function has a non-reentrancy guard, so it shouldn't be called by another `nonReentrant` function.

capReached().details: Checks whether the cap has been reached.

constructor.details: Constructor, takes maximum amount of wei accepted in the crowdsale.

params.theCap: Max amount of wei to be contributed

returns._0: the number of token units a buyer gets per wei.
the address where funds are collected.
